alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:14AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cameron and eastern Willacy Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 713 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arroyo City to near Fort Brown Memorial Golf Course. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Los Fresnos, South Padre Island, Southmost, Port Of Brownsville, Cameron Park, Laureles, Downtown Brownsville, Brownsville, Lincoln Park and Longoria Elementary School. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 1 and 8. US Highway 281 between mile markers 836 and 838. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron
